price: Ní ọjọ́ tí A máa ṣí ojúgun sílẹ̀, A sì máa pè wọ́n síbi ìforíkanlẹ̀, wọn kò sì níí lè ṣe é.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقٖ وَيُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yuk'shafu ʿan sāqin wayud'ʿawna ilā al-sujūdi falā yastaṭīʿūna
